text: Crystal Pepsi was the clear choice for soda in the 90s. Did you ever try it? 🥤 #90sDrinks
LAN parties were proof you didn’t need Wi-Fi to game with friends. 🔌 #TechNostalgia
Warheads were the ultimate sour candy challenge. Sweet victory or too intense? 🍬 #RetroCandy
'I’ll be there for you...' If *Friends* wasn’t part of your week, what was? 🖤 #90sTV
Saturday mornings were a mix of sugary cereal and cartoons. What was your cereal of choice? 🥣📺 #90sSnacks
TRL was where music met chaos. Who topped your list of must-see artists? 🎵📺 #90sMusic
VHS tapes were rewind or bust. What was your most-watched movie? 📼 #RetroMedia
TGIF Fridays had the best shows and the best vibes. What was your go-to lineup? 📺 #90sTV
